attributes.action: Make the ‘Laws’ on DRONES stronger with some Banning of use, could be used by IS
attributes.additional_details: Let’s get this put right to stop them being abused.
attributes.background: Gatwick Airport which was in Lockdown should never happen if there was say a License for every person with one, also some form of signal to ID them, far too many being flown close to Planes, shame a few spoil it for others, there are too many ways they can be used like IS and ones who kill.

rejection.details:
We understand that you would like the law on drones changes but we're not sure what you mean by "some banning of use".

You could start a new petition setting out clearly how you would like the law changed.
